about_the_game:
Dive into the thrilling action of this first-person destruction game, where you play as a lone warrior armed with a pickaxe against towering rocks. Your mission? Smash these obstacles to dust to collect shimmering gold nuggets.
Explore a universe rich in challenges where the reward matches the courage you invest. With an arsenal of 12 unique pickaxes to unlock, each victory brings you closer to the peak of mining glory.
Take on other players in frantic competitions of speed and gold nugget collection to prove your supremacy. Who will dominate the leaderboard and rise to the top of this golden world?
Designed for all ages, this game offers an immersive experience where you can play at your own pace, unwind after a busy day, or simply unleash your competitiveness.
Note that certain features, such as leaderboards, will be added in future updates to further enrich your gaming experience. Get ready for the ultimate gold rush adventure!

Take on other players in frantic competitions of speed and gold nugget collection to prove your supremacy. Who will dominate the leaderboard and rise to the top of this golden world?
Designed for all ages, this game offers an immersive experience where you can play at your own pace, unwind after a busy day, or simply unleash your competitiveness.

name: GOLD MINER CHALLENGER

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 de 2 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 de 2 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Dive into the action in this thrilling destruction game where you collect gold nuggets and unlock a multitude of items. Take on the top challengers in intense competitions. Realistic physics make every pickaxe swing satisfying. Take on the challenge now!
